title: [OffTopic] Congratulations to all the 2025 Graduates 🎓. May you all excel in your life 😄.
content: May the pride of pesu be with you🙏.

comments.body:
From PESts to Corporate Slaves, y'all have come a long way :")

All the best to everyone, hope you all succeed regardless of where life takes you ❤️

May the PRIDE of PESU be with you :vckek:
You would want to move to farming some day :))
The upgrade from "IIT Bangalore" tag to "Stanford University of India" tag is unreal.

Other colleges in the country claim to be as good as IITs. Stanford is trying to prove that they are as good as us.

We are on a different level
Ley bondli, I was trying to say farming would give you more peace than corporate. Mofo can't even comprehend.

Yare Koogaadali Oore Horaadali

Ninna Nemmadhige Bhangavilla

Yemme Ninnage Saatiyilla

Bisilu Malege Birugali

Chalige Nee

Alukadhe Mundhe Saaguve


These were the motivational lines told to us
